description.title: Grape
description.body: A juicy purple grape. Can be eaten raw.

description.title: Red Apple
description.body: A crisp, juicy red apple. Restores a small amount of health and reduces hunger.

description.title: Berry
description.body: A small, sweet berry. Provides a minor health boost.

description.title: Mushroom
description.body: A common forest mushroom. Safe to eat and slightly nutritious.

description.title: Bread
description.body: A freshly baked loaf of bread. Satisfies hunger effectively.

description.title: Sword
description.body: A sharp sword for combat. Deals moderate damage.

description.title: Dagger
description.body: A small, sharp dagger. Fast attack speed but lower damage.

description.title: Mace
description.body: A heavy mace. Slow but deals high damage.

description.title: Spear
description.body: A long spear. Good for keeping enemies at a distance.

description.title: Hammer
description.body: A heavy hammer. Deals crushing damage to enemies.

description.title: Wooden Staff
description.body: A basic wooden staff. Enhances magical abilities slightly.

description.title: Wooden Wand
description.body: A simple wooden wand. Focuses magical energy for spells.

description.title: Spell Book
description.body: A book containing basic spells. Study to learn new magical abilities.

description.title: Magic Scroll
description.body: A scroll with magical inscriptions. Contains a single-use spell.

description.title: Orange
description.body: A juicy orange. Rich in vitamins and restores a small amount of health.

description.title: Carrot
description.body: A fresh orange carrot. Good for your eyesight.

description.title: Potato
description.body: A starchy potato. Can be cooked in various ways.

description.title: Tomato
description.body: A ripe red tomato. Juicy and nutritious.

description.title: Corn
description.body: A golden ear of corn. Sweet and filling.

description.title: Pumpkin
description.body: A large orange pumpkin. Can be used in cooking or crafting.

description.title: Cabbage
description.body: A leafy green cabbage. Nutritious but not very filling.

description.title: Onion
description.body: A pungent onion. Adds flavor to cooked dishes.

description.title: Garlic
description.body: A bulb of garlic. Adds flavor to food and repels certain monsters.

description.title: Pepper
description.body: A spicy red pepper. Adds heat to dishes and can be used in potions.

description.title: Fish
description.body: A fresh fish. Can be cooked for better nutritional value.

description.title: Raw Meat
description.body: A piece of raw meat. Can be cooked for better effects.

description.title: Raw Chicken
description.body: A raw chicken. Should be cooked before eating.

description.title: Egg
description.body: A fresh egg. Can be cooked or used in recipes.

description.title: Cheese
description.body: A wedge of cheese. Nutritious and satisfying.

description.title: Milk
description.body: A bottle of fresh milk. Restores a small amount of health.

description.title: Water
description.body: A flask of clean water. Quenches thirst.

description.title: Health Potion
description.body: A small vial of red liquid. Restores 25 health points when consumed.

description.title: Stamina Potion
description.body: A small vial of green liquid. Restores 25 stamina points when consumed.

description.title: Mana Potion
description.body: A small vial of blue liquid. Restores 25 mana points when consumed.

description.title: Strength Potion
description.body: A small vial of orange liquid. Temporarily increases strength.

description.title: Agility Potion
description.body: A small vial of yellow liquid. Temporarily increases agility.

description.title: Intelligence Potion
description.body: A small vial of purple liquid. Temporarily increases intelligence.

description.title: Poison
description.body: A small vial of toxic green liquid. Causes damage over time when applied to weapons.

description.title: Antidote
description.body: A small vial of clear liquid. Cures poison effects.

description.title: Elixir
description.body: A powerful magical elixir. Restores all health, mana, and stamina.

description.title: Invisibility Potion
description.body: A rare potion that grants temporary invisibility.

description.title: Transformation Potion
description.body: A mysterious potion that temporarily transforms the user into a different creature.

description.title: Gold Coin
description.body: A standard gold coin. Used as currency throughout the realm.

description.title: Silver Coin
description.body: A silver coin. Worth less than gold but still valuable.

description.title: Bronze Coin
description.body: A bronze coin. The most common form of currency.

description.title: Diamond
description.body: A sparkling diamond. Extremely valuable and can be used in high-level crafting.

description.title: Emerald
description.body: A beautiful green emerald. Highly valuable and used in magical crafting.

description.title: Sapphire
description.body: A deep blue sapphire. Valuable and used in water-based magical items.

description.title: Amethyst
description.body: A purple amethyst. Valuable and used in mind-affecting magical items.

description.title: Ruby
description.body: A sparkling red gemstone. Highly valuable and can be used in crafting magical items.

description.title: Topaz
description.body: A golden topaz. Valuable and used in light-based magical items.

description.title: Opal
description.body: An iridescent opal. Valuable and used in illusion-based magical items.

description.title: Pearl
description.body: A lustrous pearl. Valuable and used in water-based magical items.

description.title: Jade
description.body: A smooth green jade. Valuable and used in earth-based magical items.

description.title: Amber
description.body: A piece of fossilized amber. Valuable and sometimes contains preserved insects.

description.title: Obsidian
description.body: A piece of black obsidian. Used in dark magic and crafting sharp weapons.

description.title: Leather Helmet
description.body: A basic leather helmet. Provides minimal protection.

description.title: Leather Chestplate
description.body: A basic leather chestplate. Provides minimal protection for the torso.

description.title: Wooden Shield
description.body: A basic wooden shield. Provides minimal protection against physical attacks.

description.title: Iron Helmet
description.body: An iron helmet. Provides good protection for the head.

description.title: Iron Chestplate
description.body: An iron chestplate. Provides good protection for the torso.

description.title: Iron Shield
description.body: An iron shield. Provides good protection against physical attacks.

description.title: Steel Helmet
description.body: A steel helmet. Provides excellent protection for the head.

description.title: Steel Chestplate
description.body: A steel chestplate. Provides excellent protection for the torso.

description.title: Steel Shield
description.body: A steel shield. Provides excellent protection against physical attacks.

description.title: Mithril Helmet
description.body: A mithril helmet. Provides superior protection and is lightweight.

description.title: Mithril Chestplate
description.body: A mithril chestplate. Provides superior protection for the torso and is lightweight.

description.title: Mithril Shield
description.body: A mithril shield. Provides superior protection against physical and magical attacks.

description.title: Dragon Helmet
description.body: A helmet forged from dragon scales. Provides unmatched protection and fire resistance.

description.title: Dragon Chestplate
description.body: A chestplate forged from dragon scales. Provides unmatched protection and fire resistance.

description.title: Leather Boots
description.body: Basic leather boots. Provides minimal protection for the feet.

description.title: Leather Gloves
description.body: Basic leather gloves. Provides minimal protection for the hands.

description.title: Leather Pants
description.body: Basic leather pants. Provides minimal protection for the legs.

description.title: Iron Boots
description.body: Iron boots. Provides good protection for the feet.

description.title: Iron Gauntlets
description.body: Iron gauntlets. Provides good protection for the hands.

description.title: Iron Leggings
description.body: Iron leggings. Provides good protection for the legs.

description.title: Steel Boots
description.body: Steel boots. Provides excellent protection for the feet.

description.title: Steel Gauntlets
description.body: Steel gauntlets. Provides excellent protection for the hands.

description.title: Steel Leggings
description.body: Steel leggings. Provides excellent protection for the legs.

description.title: Mithril Boots
description.body: Mithril boots. Provides superior protection for the feet and is lightweight.

description.title: Axe
description.body: A sturdy axe. Good for chopping trees and combat.

description.title: Pickaxe
description.body: A sturdy pickaxe. Used for mining ore and stone.

description.title: Shovel
description.body: A sturdy shovel. Used for digging dirt and sand.

description.title: Hoe
description.body: A sturdy hoe. Used for tilling soil for farming.

description.title: Wooden Bow
description.body: A simple wooden bow. Good for hunting and long-range combat.

description.title: Arrow
description.body: A standard arrow. Used with bows for ranged attacks.

description.title: Fire Arrow
description.body: An arrow with a flaming tip. Deals additional fire damage.

description.title: Ice Arrow
description.body: An arrow with a frozen tip. Deals additional ice damage and can slow targets.

description.title: Hunting Bow
description.body: A well-crafted hunting bow. More accurate and powerful than a standard bow.

description.title: Longbow
description.body: A long, powerful bow. Greater range and damage than standard bows.

description.title: Crossbow
description.body: A mechanical crossbow. More powerful than a bow but slower to reload.

description.title: Crossbow Bolt
description.body: A heavy bolt for crossbows. Deals more damage than standard arrows.

description.title: Fire Bolt
description.body: A crossbow bolt with a flaming tip. Deals additional fire damage.

description.title: Ice Bolt
description.body: A crossbow bolt with a frozen tip. Deals additional ice damage and can slow targets.

description.title: Poison Bolt
description.body: A crossbow bolt coated with poison. Deals damage over time to targets.

description.title: Explosive Bolt
description.body: A crossbow bolt with an explosive tip. Deals area damage on impact.

description.title: Elven Bow
description.body: A finely crafted elven bow. Exceptional accuracy and power.

description.title: Dwarven Crossbow
description.body: A masterfully crafted dwarven crossbow. Exceptional power and durability.

description.title: Cloth Hat
description.body: A simple cloth hat. Provides minimal protection but is comfortable.

description.title: Wizard Hat
description.body: A pointed wizard hat. Enhances magical abilities slightly.

description.title: Golden Crown
description.body: A golden crown. Symbol of royalty and authority.

description.title: Mage's Circlet
description.body: A magical circlet. Enhances magical abilities and focus.

description.title: Leather Hood
description.body: A leather hood. Provides some protection and conceals identity.

description.title: Bandana
description.body: A cloth bandana. Can be worn on the head or face.

description.title: Feathered Hat
description.body: A stylish hat with a feather. Popular among bards and nobles.

description.title: Horned Helmet
description.body: A helmet with intimidating horns. Strikes fear into enemies.

description.title: Reinforced Iron Helmet
description.body: A reinforced iron helmet with additional plating. Provides superior protection for your head in combat.

description.title: Winged Helmet
description.body: A helmet with decorative wings. Symbol of valor and swiftness.

description.title: Crystal Crown
description.body: A crown made of enchanted crystal. Greatly enhances magical abilities.

description.title: Demonic Helmet
description.body: A helmet with demonic features. Enhances dark magic and intimidates enemies.

description.title: Angelic Halo
description.body: A glowing halo. Enhances holy magic and provides divine protection.

description.title: Jester's Hat
description.body: A colorful jester's hat. Entertaining but provides little protection.

description.title: Magic Orb
description.body: A glowing orb filled with magical energy. Used for scrying and enhancing spells.

description.title: Crystal Ball
description.body: A clear crystal ball. Used by fortune tellers and mages to see distant places and possible futures.

description.title: Magic Lamp
description.body: An ornate lamp with mystical properties. Legends say it once contained a powerful djinn.

description.title: Fireball Scroll
description.body: A magical scroll that teaches the Fireball spell. Consume to learn the spell permanently.

description.title: Magic Staff
description.body: A wooden staff imbued with magical energy. Increases spell damage and mana regeneration.

description.title: Magic Wand
description.body: An ornate wand with powerful enchantments. Focuses magical energy for advanced spells.

description.title: Spell Tome
description.body: An ancient tome containing powerful spells. Study to learn advanced magical abilities.

description.title: Enchanted Scroll
description.body: A scroll with powerful magical inscriptions. Contains a single-use advanced spell.

description.title: Arcane Focus
description.body: A mystical object that helps channel magical energy. Enhances spell casting and reduces mana cost.

description.title: Magic Amulet
description.body: An amulet imbued with magical properties. Provides protection against harmful spells.

description.title: Magic Ring
description.body: A ring with magical properties. Enhances the wearer's magical abilities.

description.title: Magic Pendant
description.body: A pendant with magical properties. Provides protection and enhances magical abilities.

description.title: Magic Bracelet
description.body: A bracelet with magical properties. Enhances the wearer's magical abilities and provides protection.

description.title: Magic Talisman
description.body: A talisman with powerful magical properties. Provides protection against harmful magic and enhances spellcasting.

description.title: Empty Potion Bottle
description.body: An empty glass bottle. Can be filled with potions or other liquids.

description.title: Flask
description.body: A small flask for carrying liquids. Can be filled with potions or other beverages.

description.title: Vial
description.body: A small glass vial. Perfect for storing small amounts of potions or reagents.

description.title: Cauldron
description.body: A small cauldron for brewing potions. Essential for alchemists and witches.

description.title: Mortar and Pestle
description.body: A tool for grinding ingredients. Used in alchemy and potion-making.

description.title: Alembic
description.body: A distillation apparatus used in alchemy. Helps create more potent potions.

description.title: Herb Pouch
description.body: A small pouch for carrying herbs and other alchemical ingredients.

description.title: Alchemy Kit
description.body: A portable kit containing basic tools for alchemy. Allows for potion-making on the go.

description.title: Herb Bundle
description.body: A bundle of dried herbs. Used in cooking and alchemy.

description.title: Mushroom Cluster
description.body: A cluster of unusual mushrooms. Used in alchemy and potion-making.

description.title: Crystal Shard
description.body: A shard of magical crystal. Used in enchanting and high-level alchemy.

description.title: Magical Essence
description.body: A vial of concentrated magical essence. A key ingredient in powerful potions and enchantments.

description.title: Dragon Scale
description.body: A scale from a dragon. Extremely valuable and used in the most powerful potions and enchantments.

description.title: Phoenix Feather
description.body: A feather from a phoenix. Has powerful regenerative properties and is used in resurrection potions.

description.title: Fire Sword
description.body: A magical sword imbued with fire. Deals additional fire damage.

description.title: Fire Bow
description.body: A magical bow that shoots flaming arrows. Effective at long range.

description.title: Fire Axe
description.body: A magical axe imbued with fire. Deals additional fire damage and can burn trees.
